statements: DELETE FROM Soil_Moisture_Data WHERE location = 'Garden' AND moisture_level < 0.5
DELETE FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'Farm A';
DELETE FROM farm_information WHERE farmer_name = 'John Doe' AND farm_size > 50;
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 50;
DELETE FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE location = 'Field A' AND reading_date = '2022-07-10';
DELETE FROM Farmers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Farming_Records WHERE field_id = 4 AND crop_type = 'Corn'
DELETE FROM ResearchProjects WHERE project_name = 'Project A';
DELETE FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND field_id = 1;
